Service Details: - The local teacher's association for public school teachers in the Central Okanagan- Provides both a public area and a secure members only area- Members can access electronic tools, opportunities for interaction and discussion in a non-public forum, and reduced paper use- Members only area provides content about bargaining and professional development, online discussion forums, access self-directed PD, access to webinars, workshops, events, and provides opportunities to collaborate with other teachers- Public area provides info on Pro-D, access to a variety of the pro-d offerings, webinars, workshops, etc., that makes up a part of the overall professional development that COTA members participate in throughout the year
Address & Map: 200 Dougall Rd N, #101Kelowna, BC     V1X 3K5View MapQuest Map
